page.title: 09ANNUAL VILLAGE EVENTS
page.content:
ANNUAL VILLAGE EVENTS
The Field Day Committee organise a number of events for the young people of the village. The Christmas Party, which starts the new year, is a firm favourite with those aged from seven to eleven. At this event the attendants for the Rose Queen are selected who is herself chosen at a later event. The Queen and her attendants make their principal appearance at the annual carnival procession and field day. This is the day on which the village holds its sports, when children in various age categories compete for prizes. Prizes are also given for fancy dress and floats in the carnival.
